Usage:
 • Create your cheat sheet by clicking the pen button on the main screen.
 • Open your cheat sheet from the main screen.
 • Put your phone in your pocket and start cheating.
 • Read below on how to navigate through cheat sheets ↓
 
Basics:
 • Bottom left corner touch: Scroll 
 the text/image upwards.
 • Bottom right corner touch: Scroll 
 the text/image downwards.
 • Bottom left corner touch and hold: Exit 
 the cheating screen.
 • Bottom right corner touch and hold: Open 
 mini topic changer.
 • Resize button: 
 Set the number of visible lines on screen.
 
Advanced:
 • Shake to hide: Hide the cheating screen on phone shake. Touch and hold the screen to cancel. (setting is off by default in settings)
 • Additional protection: If you lock the phone while the cheating screen is hidden the app is closed.
 
Settings:
 • Font size: Change the font size that appears on the cheating screen.
 • Font family: Change the font family that appears on the cheating screen.
 • Text dim: Make the text more/less visible.
 • Shake to hide: (see advanced section ↑)
 • Screen rotation: Experimental setting if you would like to try something out in landscape.
 
Editor:
 • Click on an image if you want to crop it.
